name: Washed Cable Knit Sweater
description: Relaxed-fit sweater crafted from soft cotton yarn. Designed with a round neck, long sleeves, and a wash effect. Finished with ribbed trims. The garment has a unique appearance due to its special washing process.

name: Black Essential Hoodie
description: Super soft and ultra comfortable oversized hoodie with kangaroo pockets, ribbed hems & drop shoulders featuring a metal logo badge.

name: Baggy Jeans
description: Baggy jeans with a five-pocket design, belt loops and zip fly and top button fastening. Made of cotton.
